description:
Shimano Deore components perform well, and are at an affordable price. The 2-way release on this shifter accommodates different riding styles and positions, and lets you pull with your finger or push with your thumb.

  • Rapidfire Plus shift levers
  • Compact optical gear display
  • Suits 10-speed systems
name: Shimano Deore SL-M6000-R Right 10 Speed Shifter
